rule.condition: (same(assignee.name in $L.file.save, NULL) or not (same(assignee.name in $L.file.save, assignee.name in $L.file))) and not (same(assignee.name in $L.file, NULL))
rule.conditionDesc: (( assignee.name in SavedRecord = NULL OR assignee.name in SavedRecord != assignee.name in CurrentRecord) AND assignee.name in CurrentRecord != NULL)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignee">assignee.name</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignee">assignee.name</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignee">assignee.name</FieldName></Value></condition></collection><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignee">assignee.name</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: sd.assignee (when (( assignee.name in SavedRecord = NULL OR assignee.name in SavedRecord != assignee.name in CurrentRecord) AND assignee.name in CurrentRecord != NULL))
